3.target_utterance: I'll tell you... Tumhaari kavita mein ek to, 1st shabdh boora tha, baad mein 2nd shabdh bhi boora tha... 3rd, 4th, 5th haala ki itne boore nahi the... 6th, 7th, 8th, haan, correct, vo bhi boore the.... Lekin, lekin, Rosesh, 9th, 10th, 11th, bohot boore the!

Meri kavita mein kya boora tha?

3.code_mixed_explanation: Sahil implies ki Rosesh ki poori kavita bohot boori thi.

4.target_utterance: Padmaavati ka short from to Paddy hona chaahiye... Pappu is just so middle class!
context_utterances: Mera naam hai, Padmaavati. Pyar se log mujhe, Pappu kehate hai... Tumhaara naam kya hai? Eena, Meena, Anju,....
Meri chodo! Tum Pappu kyu ho!?
Pappu!

4.code_mixed_explanation: Maya Dushyant ko Pappu nickname hone par taunt maarti hai.

6.target_utterance: Matlab aap mujhe ek flat deengi free mein apne housing society mein?

7.target_utterance: Oh part 2, iske ek glass mein 326 calories hoti hai, samjha! Kutte ka role to gaya haat se, ab bhaise ka role bhi koi nahi dega.
context_utterances: Champagne kholo! Come on! Open the bottle!
Yes of course! Absolutely!

7.code_mixed_explanation: Indravardhan Rosesh ko taunt maarta hai ki vo champagne peene se fat ho jaaega aur koi use as role nahi milenge.

8.target_utterance: Middle class is just..., noise! 'Hahaha' kar ke hasate hai, Monisha ke C-grade jokes par.
context_utterances: No, I mean, Monisha door to door jaa ke, logonko jokes suna rahi hai! Votes jeetane ke chakkar mein.
Bruce Lee ki gujarathi bahan ka naam kya, 'Rootli'. Uhh, can you believe it.
Aur, surprising thing is, apani building vaale, has rahe the aise jokes pe.
Momma, kisi ne sach hi kaha hai, laughter is the best medicine.
Jab laughter classy ho tab.
8.english_explanation: Maya calls Monisha's jokes C-grade and mock the people who laugh at them.
8.code_mixed_explanation: Maya Monisha ke jokes ko C-grade kahati hai aur jo log un par haste hai unhe C-grade kahati hai.

50.english_explanation: Maya indicates that irrespective that indu is a male, he will have to do work
50.code_mixed_explanation: Maya kehti hai ki chahe indu mard hai firbhi use kaam karna padega

51.target_utterance: Yeh Tumhari Tafafdari thi and I am very upset mister junior Indravardhan really. and Monisha agar tum apni middle class Aadat se Baaz Nahin a sakti to please Mujhse Dur Raho.. enjoy your chik wale bhaiya ki vel
context_utterances: yah Meri Tarif Thi ya Burai
51.english_explanation: Maya mocks monisha for being middle class
51.code_mixed_explanation: Maya monisha ko mocks karti hai middle class hone ke liye

52.target_utterance: Oh ho, Rosesh, tu kyu aya!
context_utterances: Oh my God! It's a tie!
Tie!?
Tie!?
Tie!?
52.english_explanation: Indravardhan taunts Rosesh as his vote caused a tie in the election.
52.code_mixed_explanation: Indravardhan Rosesh ko taunt maarta hai kyu ki uske vote se election tie ho gaya.

context_utterances: aap kon?
chika, chika ma ki pon
53.english_explanation: Sahil makes fun of chika's language
53.code_mixed_explanation: Sahil chika ki boli ka mazak udata hai

54.target_utterance: Next time tumhaare yaha aaenge na Dushyant, ek, ek kar ke sab pair tudavaenge, okay.
context_utterances: Poore building ka fuse gaya hai.
Oh my God! To doctor kaise dekhega mere paao!
Ek to ye humari emergency light bhi nahi kaam kar rahi.
Oh ho, humare ghar mein to teen teen emergency lights hai.
I know..., kaash Rosesh ka paao humare ghar pe tuta hota.
54.english_explanation: Maya is angry at Dushyant for caring more about the emergency lights than about Rosesh.
54.code_mixed_explanation: Maya Dushyant par gussa hai kyu ki vo Rosesh se jyaada emergency lights ke bare mein care karta hai.

context_utterances: Ye saare..., roomaal tumane kaha se khareede?
Khareede nahi hai, maine silavaaye hai Sahil.
55.english_explanation: Maya is shocked that Monisha sewed the handkerchieves.
55.code_mixed_explanation: Maya shocked hai ki Monisha ne roomal silavaaye hai.

context_utterances: Oh, Jaishankar bhai.
I am so honoured!
So am I!
Waah, Maya!
Um, well, maine aap ko kaha tha na, ki hum pati patani, ek dusare ki museebat samajh ne ke liye jab ek dusare ke jagah par khade hote hai, to koi kasar nahi chodate.
56.english_explanation: Jaishankar is amazed to see Indravardhan in a saari.
56.code_mixed_explanation: Jaishankar Indravardhan ko saadi mein dekhakar hairaan hai.

57.target_utterance: Pch, tu ruk ja na. Aaj election hai, aur tu ja raha hai... Cheeku beta, papa ko bolo, not to go, not to go!
context_utterances: Aray cheeku baba, pappa ko bye bye bolo. Kyu ki bohot jald hum papa ko paan ke beech mein rakh ke chaba jaane vaale hai!
Ye kya bol rahe hai aap dad!
Sahil, tum supari hai na. Sarote ke beech fasi supari.
57.english_explanation: Indravardhan teases Sahil to stay as today its the election between Monisha and Maya.
57.code_mixed_explanation: Indravardhan Sahil to tease karta hai ki vo ruk jaae kyui ki aaj Maya aur Monisha ke beech mein election hai.

58.target_utterance: Haan haan karo karo, thik se pack karo tum to cahate hi ho na ki mein ghar chood ke chaali jayu? Tum bhi to Sarabhai family ki ho na. Rayis khoon aur middle class Monisha Singh. Singh Aluwaliya nahi, Singh Bedi nahi, Singh Bhatti bhi nahi sirf Singh. Phir to surname mein bhi bachat. To bachat karne mein kuch goonah hain kya? Mein saabjiwale se kaha ki ek kilo fhulkopi ki tis rupaya nahi dungi to ho gayi shuru. " Beta bargain karna humain sobha nahi dete, its so middle class!" Wo bhi saabziwaale ki saamne! Uske baad wo kya khaas bhao khaata. Pucho daddy se.
context_utterances: Mein ghar chod kar ja rahi hoon. Ab please ye mat puchna ki mein kaha ja raho hoon.
Arey arey arey Sahil bete ye kya kar rahe ho? Usse rokne ke wajay, manane ki wajay tum uske bag thik se pack kar rahe ho?
58.english_explanation: Monisha mocks herself by saying she is cheap
58.code_mixed_explanation: Monisha khud ko middle class kehke khud ko tana marti hai

context_utterances: Hello boys, bade cute lag rahe hai aap teeno.
59.english_explanation: Maya does not find Dushyant cute.
59.code_mixed_explanation: Maya ko Dushyant cute nahi lagata.

60.target_utterance: or maya bhangra karna chaahati hai... dhum pichak dhum... haina, peeche mud ke man hi man muskura rhi ho na ki haan, mere sahil ka peeche to chut jaega.
context_utterances: do you understand the meaning of this... mom
well, iska matlab yahi hai na monisha or us patang ke beech kuch... you know pech lad gye ho... shayad. Monisha ab tumse mentally door jaa rhi hai. Shayad wo tumhare sath nhi rehna chah rhi or...
60.english_explanation: Indu mocks maya for being happy that monisha might leave
60.code_mixed_explanation: Indu maya ko tana marta hai ki wo khush hai ki monisha chali jaegi
